net.viktorc.detroid.framework.util

Class GrayCode

  • Object
    • GrayCode

  • public class GrayCode
extends Object
    A utility class for gray coding integers and for converting gray coded numbers into their natural values.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static long decode(long g)
      Converts a gray coded number to its natural value.
      static long encode(long n)
      Converts a number to its gray coded value.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public static long encode(long n)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Converts a number to its gray coded value.
        Parameters:
        n - The natural value of the number.
        Returns:
        The gray coded value of the number.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If n is less than 0.

      • decode

        public static long decode(long g)
        Converts a gray coded number to its natural value.
        Parameters:
        g - The gray coded value of the number.
        Returns:
        The natural value of the number.
